# FFmpeg Debug Output Sample
#
# Command:
#   ffmpeg -hide_banner -nostdin -loglevel debug \
#     -reconnect 1 -reconnect_streamed 1 -reconnect_on_network_error 1 \
#     -rw_timeout 15000000 \
#     -progress pipe:2 \
#     -stats -stats_period 1 \
#     -i http://10.177.0.10:17080/stream.m3u8 \
#     -map 0 -c copy -f null -
#
# Duration: ~13 seconds before Ctrl+C
# Date: 2026-01-22
#
# This output shows:
#   - Progress key=value blocks (every 1 second)
#   - HLS segment requests with URLs
#   - TCP connection attempts with IP:port
#   - HTTP request headers
#   - Manifest refresh cycles
#   - Media sequence changes
#   - Final statistics (packets, bytes per stream)
#
